name: thinbus-srp
description: Secure Remote Password SRP SRP6a implementation.

scripts.build: browserify -x crypto -r random-strings > random-strings.js; browserify -r crypto-js/sha256 > sha256.js; browserify -r jsbn > jsbn.js; browserify --standalone thinbus --full-paths --no-bundle-external -x jsbn -x crypto-js/sha256 -r ./client.old.js:SRP6JavascriptClientSessionSHA256 -o browser.js
scripts.build-es: cat jsbn-core.js random-strings-simple.js sha256-sync.js client-exports.js > client.mjs
scripts.build-server: cat jsbn-core.js random-strings-simple.js sha256-sync.js server-exports.js > server.mjs
